#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
//	freopen("cricket.in","r",stdin);
	
	int T; cin >> T;
	while(T--)
	{
		int N; cin >> N;
		int cricketRound[N];
		int score = 0;
		
		for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
		{
			
			cin >> score;
			cricketRound[i] = score*3;
			
		}//end for
		
		for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
		{
			cin >> score;
			cricketRound[i] += score;
		}
		cout << *max_element(cricketRound,cricketRound+N) << endl;
		//cout << endl;
	}//end while
	
	return 0;
	
}//end main
